original_text: Do not be afraid. Remember that I made a promise to your ancestors when I brought them out of Egypt. I promised them that I would be with them. My Spirit is now with you too.
korean_text: 너희가 애굽에서 나올 때에 내가 너희와 언약한 말과 나의 영이 계속하여 너희 가운데에 머물러 있나니 너희는 두려워하지 말지어다

sentences.original_text: Remember that I made a promise to your ancestors
when I brought them out of Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 이집트에서 인도해 낼 때

sentences.original_text: that I would be with them.
My Spirit is now with you too.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 영은 지금 너희와 함께 있다.
